data.title: Microsoft Sans Serif font family - Typography
data.meta_description: Typographic info for the Microsoft Sans Serif font family
data.text:
Microsoft Sans Serif font family

Article

03/30/2022

Overview

Microsoft Sans Serif font is a very legible User Interface (UI) font. It was designed to be metrically compatible with the MS Sans bitmap font that shipped in early versions of Microsoft Windows.

Description File name Micross.ttf Styles & Weights Microsoft Sans Serif Designers N/A Copyright Â© 2012 Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved. Font vendor Microsoft Corp. Script Tags dlng:'Armn', 'Cyrl', 'Geor', 'Grek', 'Latn'
